page.title: 15CLUBS - Lydham/More
page.content: {Lydham Village Hall}is the normal meeting place for clubs in this area. The only club meeting regularly is {Lydham, More & Snead Women's Institute which meets on the third Thursday of each month. It is run by a committee of 12 members who meet the previous Thursday. The Institute is 29 yrs old and has 26 members. Meetings begin at 7.30pm. There is business, then a speaker/demonstration.{Topics covered this year are: Crime Prevention; Care of Silver, etc; Growing Vegetables for Show; Citizens Advice Bureau; Shropshire Birds; Ideas for Christmas Fair; Main meals with little meat and Making Walking Sticks. Refreshments are then served followed by entertain- ment. Although{no other Clubs}meet in this area people belong to{many clubs {and Charitable Organisations}and travel to meetings outside the area.
